title: One Piece Episode #563 Anime Review
author: Fandom Post
description: A written review of Episode 563 discussing the revelatory moments, particularly praising Robin's performance and Hody's motivation reveal. Notes that there are revelatory moments for several characters and that Jinbe comes across well.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Spoils episode 563 events including Hody's revelation

title: 563-564: A Shocking Fact! the True Identity of Hordy! and Back to Zero! Earnest Wishes for Luffy!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post discussing episodes 563-564, focusing on the revelation of Hody's 'Nothing' answer and the thematic significance of inherited hatred versus personal experience.

title: One Piece; Why Hody Jones is one of the greatest villains in the One Piece franchise
author: The Birds of Hermes
description: An analytical article arguing that Hody Jones is one of the greatest villains in One Piece due to his representation of pure, baseless hatred and the realistic portrayal of radicalization and inherited prejudice. Discusses the 'Nothing' revelation extensively.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Analyzes Hody Jones throughout the Fish-Man Island arc

title: One Piece: Fishman Island (517-574) Episode 563 - A Shocking Fact! The True Identity of Hordy!
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming of Episode 563 on Crunchyroll. While the rest of the Straw Hats continue to fight bravely, Luffy tries to find a way to save the island, and the horrible truth about Hordy's hatred for humans is finally revealed!
